pages.title: Login
pages.description: User authentication page where users can sign in to access the budget transfer system

pages.title: Dashboard
pages.description: Main overview page showing key metrics, recent activities, and quick access to budget transfer operations

pages.title: Transfers
pages.description: This is the main page for viewing all transfer operations related to Fund Adjustment Requests (FAR) modifications It. You can also use this page to create or update FAR transfers. Additionally, it allows you to track ERP workflows and accept budget transfer approvals associated with FAR codes. also View detailed information about a specific contract including terms, status, and transaction history with FAR codes.

pages.title: Enhancements
pages.description: This is the main page for viewing all transfer operations related to Fund Adjustment Department (FAD) modifications It. You can also use this page to create or update FAD transfers. Additionally, it allows you to track ERP workflows and accept budget transfer approvals associated with FAD codes.  also View detailed information about a specific contract including terms, status, and transaction history with FAD codes.

pages.title: Settlements
pages.description: This is the main page for viewing all transfer operations related to Additional Fund Requests (AFR) modifications It. You can also use this page to create or update AFR transfers. Additionally, it allows you to track ERP workflows and accept budget transfer approvals associated with AFR codes. also View detailed information about a specific contract including terms, status, and transaction history with AFR codes.

pages.title: Contracts Pending Approval
pages.description: Review and approve or reject pending contract requests for Fund Adjustment Requests (FAR)

pages.title: Settlements Pending Approval
pages.description: Review and approve or reject pending contract requests for Fund Adjustment Department (FAD)

pages.title: Enhancements Pending Approval
pages.description: Review and approve or reject pending contract requests for Additional Fund Requests (AFR)

pages.title: Cost Center Transfer Request
pages.description: Create or view specific cost center transfer requests with detailed budget allocation information

pages.title: Notifications
pages.description: View system notifications, alerts, and updates related to your transfers and approvals

pages.title: User Management
pages.description: Administrative interface for managing user accounts, roles, and permissions (Admin only)

pages.title: Account Entity Management
pages.description: Manage organizational accounts and entity structures for budget allocation (Admin only)

pages.title: Accounts Entity View
pages.description: Comprehensive view of all account entities and their relationships within the organization (Admin only)

navigationGuards.authentication: All routes except login require user authentication
navigationGuards.authorization: Admin routes require admin role privileges

navigationGuards.authentication: All routes except login require user authentication
navigationGuards.authorization: Admin routes require admin role privileges
